title: What's the most innovative Chinese company? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, of course. If you look at wireless (one of the most important areas) then Husawei has more patents than almost anyone exzcept Qualcomm. That is an objective measure of innovation. Subjectively, Huawei, ZTE, Xiaomi etc all have lots of innovation. In other areas, Haier, WeChsat, Weibo, Tencent etc
